item.description:
I am taking the group on a slight tangent.  

 

We have and will continue to "run out of planet" in our capitalistic addiction to relentless growth. No matter what we do to the planet, Mother Earth herself will still be here so "saving the planet" is irrelevant.  The real challenge is to save civilization as we have come to know it and/or prepare to live with what it will become in the decades ahead.

 

Working now with the Green Trade Association, I am focused on helping small to medium green businesses launch, sustain, and thrive.  While the new reports are cluttered with impotent politicians beholden to special interests and unable to make a decision, innovation and creativity thrives in labs, garages and in the minds of innovators like you!  

 

If you or someone you know has a brilliant idea for a green/sustainable business and you want to meet like minded souls/partners/entrepreneurs, let's talk.

 

Thoughts?

 

John
item.how_to_find_us: Looking for a cool place in Boston, JP, or Cambridge
item.name: Meet to network and discuss the solutions we need to be green & MAKE green!
